title: Application for obtaining the Occupancy Certificate for buildings in project, in full or part shall be submitted by Project Proponent/s to the concerned branch Officer of Town Planning (1) or to the concerned Authority, as the case may be
clause_text: Application for obtaining the Occupancy Certificate for buildings in project, in full or part shall be submitted by Project Proponent/s to the concerned branch Officer of Town Planning (1) or to the concerned Authority, as the case may be. Such application shall be accompanied by -
